response_requirements.initial_response_description: Records open to inspection at reasonable times under reasonable conditions and supervision
response_requirements.final_response_notes: No specific statutory deadline; reasonable time standard

fee_structure.search_fee_notes: May charge reasonable fees for providing copies; cannot exceed actual cost
fee_structure.copy_fee_notes: Reasonable fees; cannot exceed actual reproduction cost
fee_structure.electronic_fee: Actual cost not to exceed agency's actual cost of providing electronic records

exemptions.description: Medical and related public health records of individuals
Records required to be kept confidential by federal law or regulation or state law
Records compiled for law enforcement that would interfere with proceedings, deprive fair trial, invade privacy, disclose confidential source, reveal techniques, or endanger life/safety
Confidential financial information including procedures or security for collection or processing of negotiable instruments
Records of vital statistics and adoption proceedings per AS 18.50
Trade secrets and confidential commercial information

appeal_process.first_level_notes: No administrative appeal specified; court enforcement available
appeal_process.attorney_fees_notes: Attorney fees may be available through court action

requester_requirements.request_format_notes: Right to inspect at reasonable times under reasonable conditions

agency_obligations.records_officer_notes: Custodian of record or designee supervises inspection
agency_obligations.electronic_records_provision: Must provide electronic records if they exist in electronic format, can be retrieved with reasonable effort, and doesn't violate licensing agreements
agency_obligations.reasonable_search_required: Must conduct reasonable search to identify responsive records

validation_metadata.verification_notes: All fields manually verified from official Alaska statute. Reasonable time standard with no specific deadline. Reasonable fees cannot exceed actual cost. Electronic records available if exist in format and can be retrieved with reasonable effort. 6 exemptions with specific Alaska Stat. § 40.25.120(b) subsection citations. No administrative appeal. Court enforcement.
